Hungarian: Az iskola egy hét múlva kezdődik.

English: At what time does school start?
At what time did you wake up?
At what time did school finish?
Hungarian: Hány órakor ért véget az iskola?
Az iskola háromnegyed háromkor ért véget.

English: At what time will you come?
At what time do you wake up in the morning?
I wake up at half past five.
At what time did school end?
School ended at half past four.
Hungarian: Fél ötkor ért véget az iskola.

English: At what time did you wake up yesterday?
I woke up yesterday at ten o'clock.
Have you ever been in a car accident?
How often do you go to the gym?
How long have you been sick?
How long are you on vacation?
How long do the flowers last?
For how long did you rent the cottage?
For how long did you travel?
For how long did you get housing support?

Finnish: Kuinka moneksi viikoksi haluat lähteä lomalle?
English: For how many weeks do you want to go on vacation?

Finnish: Kuinka moneksi vuodeksi opiskelusi jatkuvat vielä?
English: For how many years will your studies continue?
Hungarian: Hány évig folytatódnak még a tanulmányaid?

English: For how many hours do you need the moving truck?
Hungarian: Hány órára van szükséged a költöztetőautóra?

English: In how much time did you lose 10 kilos?
In how much time will the ambulance arrive?
Hungarian: Mennyi idő alatt érkezik meg a mentő?

English: In how much time are the exams graded?
Hungarian: Mennyi idő alatt javítják ki a vizsgákat?

English: In how much time must it be collected?

Finnish: Mihin mennessä täytyy maksaa laina takaisin?
English: By when must the loan be repaid?
By when must the answers be submitted?
By when must the study place be accepted?
By when must the homework be returned?

Finnish: Mihin mennessä homma pitää olla korjattu?
English: By when must the job be fixed?
From when to when does the semester last?
From when to when does the meeting last?
How long are you working here?
From when to when does your vacation last?

Finnish: Tämän viikon alusta ensi viikon loppuun.
English: From the beginning of this week until the end of next week.
Hungarian: E hét elejétől a jövő hét végéig.

English: From when to when did you study today?

Finnish: Kuinka pitkän ajan päästä oireet häviävät?
English: After how long will the symptoms disappear?
Hungarian: Mennyi idő múlva múlnak el a tünetek?

Finnish: Kuinka pitkän ajan päästä haluat minun muistuttavan siitä?
English: After how long do you want me to remind you of it?
When may I come to see you?
